title: Favorite LoL Cosplays
body:
Post all the awesome cosplay from the community. When posting remember to link to the cosplayer's site, credit their name and credit the photographer.

Hey this is my fav at the moment! I love the lighting of this awesome cosplay!

**Cosplayer:** Missyeru - https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=627843970582471&set=pb.402606693106201.-2207520000.1379444493.&type=3&theater

**Photographer:** Martin Wong - https://www.facebook.com/martinwongphotography?directed_target_id=0


http://imgur.com/0ws8IRQ

replies.body:
Hello Martlet! 
Here's my Riven, Nidalee and Ahri cosplay! 

http://i.imgur.com/I1sRkSa.jpg http://i.imgur.com/Lrz5HJa.jpg http://i.imgur.com/TzGavOh.jpg

I'm in the process of making Championship Riven, and Akali!

You can also find my cosplay page at www.facebook.com/EcliptikaCosplay

Thank you for making this thread! I can't wait to see more League Cosplays!

- Ecliptika.
I LOVE your snow bunny Nidalee so much! I remember seeing it a while ago. It's so good. ^_^

Thank you so much! <3
I can't wait for my Championship Riven to be done. I'll update this once I get a photo! :D
Oh awesome! I don't think I've seen a Championship Riven yet. Will you be showing off your completed work anywhere?
I can't reply to you, so I'm just replying to myself to say...YES! I will be there. :D
Yes, I'll be at World Finals. Will you be attending? :)
Really nice work! I love your Snowbunny Nidalee like woah

Since Missyeru seems to be pretty well represented, I'll post some others:

http://i.imgur.com/LAGY9BSh.jpg

My page is Kohalu Cosplay (https://www.facebook.com/KohaluCosplay)

I am forever in love with Avery's LeBlanc:
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=350493048354231&set=pb.209222229147981.-2207520000.1379447631.&type=3&theater

And Danielle's been up to some pretty cool stuff:
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=174869622687253&set=a.174718899368992.1073741841.135954436578772&type=3&theater

Obligatory Misseyru post!!

http://imgur.com/gCYNsor
http://imgur.com/lhqInQh
http://imgur.com/2nWqHmS

https://www.facebook.com/MissyeruCosplay

I've made a few LoL cosplays (mostly for PAX Prime)!

So far I've done Classic Soraka (before her model rework), Reverse Annie, and Lollipoppy. :3 (Photo credit to my bf and costume assistant.) My cosplay page is https://www.facebook.com/fiendle


http://i.imgur.com/KVwXABx.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/XZnUPJA.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/H3zXHVu.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/bf6A5IZ.jpg

There are so many super sweet and talented cosplayers, I couldn't possibly list them all... :C But I will give a special mention to some lesser knowns who have captured my heart: Spicy-Seasoning in her High Commander Katarina (photo by Shun Al Hayashi), and 4 Itchy Tasty in his Fiddlesticks. 

http://i.imgur.com/2Yc1DBB.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/fa0l1jO.jpg

Just wanted to share several shots of Reverse Annie from PAX.  Keep up the great work!

PAX 2013

http://www.flickr.com/photos/vsmak/9657232933/

PAX 2012

http://www.flickr.com/photos/vsmak/7910576446/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/vsmak/7910576198/

Aww thanks. ^-^ PAX Prime 2012 was my first convention to wear Reverse Annie, and TBH it was originally intended as just a silly casual costume I didn't expect people to notice (I was also running on 4 days no sleep by that point, lolol). But people seemed to enjoy it, so I put in the extra effort to buy a fitting wig and have more fun with the make-up this time around. And I was still just as silly. >:3

Thanks for the pics, I love the one of me and Pizoobie from this year (considered even asking if I could put it on my website, if that's ok). They all capture my Raggedy Annie doll and Metroid-Tibbers hat so well. <3

It's so awesome to see all the amazing cosplay, I do miss out chance to reach out to all those I have photos of.  I hope that I either encounter them on forums or they find the photos somewhere online.  I look forward to going to more events to shoot more.

Sure you're free to use the photos, just provide a credit link back.  I probably have other shots I can send over to your Facebook if you'd like.

Irelia was my first cosplay, and I remade the chest piece the second time I cosplayed her. c:

http://i.imgur.com/2F2cFYa.jpg
http://imgur.com/pWoqtHK

(Photos by Otakon Photo Suite and mamuro5254)

I also had the opportunity to debut my Championship Riven and shoot with Kadu=Out Cosplay (Lucian), SRP Cosplay (Male!Vi), and Shinrajunkie (Draven) this past Otakon and they are all fantastic cosplayers! <3

http://imgur.com/Od6I2GO
http://imgur.com/14m0As8

Photography by Scott Souvannasane~

Also I'm a huge fan of Missyeru, Kohalu, Vensy, Spicy Seasoning, Fiendle, Britthebadger, Bonnies Cosplay, Team Rainbow Might Cosplay, Mghost Cosplay, Kamikaze Miko, Junkers Cosplay, SpacePizza Cosplay, Jynx , Ecliptika, Okageo Cosplay, The Neo Tokyo Project, Danielle Beaulieu, Pizoobie, 4 itchy Tasty! Cosplay, and Vivi Cakes! <3 And so many other people but I can't remember them off of the top of my head right now. ><
Your Irelia cosplay is AMAZING!

Aww, thanks for the mention and support! <3 I think I may have seen you at Otakon. I was wearing my Reverse Annie cosplay, but was misinformed about the LoL photoshoot/meetup and only arrived super flustered at the very end when everyone was wrapping up. XD;

Do your Irelia blades actually open/close, or is it just the photo angles? Very nice work for first cosplays, look forward to more! :)

I saw that you were in the group event but I don't think I actually saw you at the con. :( Would you be going next year?

And yeah, they do open and close. I photoshopped the mechanism out in the first photo but you can see them in the second. 

Thank you so much, looking forward to your work too! :D

Sivir could definitely use more cosplay love, so that would be awesome to see! Do you have a cosplay page I could follow? You'll have to keep me updated so I recognize you, or just come say hi if you see me (since, knowing me, I might be half blind behind a mask or floating contact)!
I was planning to make one once I turned 18, so in one more month. ^^ I'll add you on my personal account~

Yeah, on Saturday I literally got to the group event right as they were finishing the final "everyone kill Teemo" shoot and then did the dance off. xD So I just had to ask individuals if they would take pictures with me. It was still fun, just wish I wasn't running around with the wrong info for 45 minutes trying to find everyone and could have made it before 80% of the people left. 

The current plan is to attend Otakon next year! C: Not sure what my cosplay plans will be yet, but more LoL costumes would be fun. I'm actually really wanting to make both a (realistic) Gentleman Cho'gath and female Kassadin... but we'll see how funds, time, handlers and airline regulations play into those dreams. XD Cute and casual is always easy to pack and wear if my crazy plans don't work out.

Ahhh it was too hot for me so I left kind of early. I wish I had stayed and gotten a pic with you! :(

I'm planning on going so hopefully we can meet up next year! I'm thinking about making the Chinese splash art Sivir. :3

Here's the Shaco one I made last year. I really love how it came out in the end. =)

http://i.imgur.com/WCAmlgD.jpg

I think it was RiotNarsil that took the photo.

Hey I took shots of cosplay this year PAX and last, is this you too?

http://www.flickr.com/photos/vsmak/7910575564/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/vsmak/7910575794/
Yep, that's me! =D
This is fantastic! Was this your first cosplay or do you have others?
That's my first. I made a Thresh one and I wore it at this year's PAX but I can't find any good pictures of it yet, and I still want to make a few changes to it.

I'll post a link to one of mine, as Debonair Jayce with IronStylus.

http://i.imgur.com/ZscLMTH.jpg
So suave!
Yes, he was.  Oh, you meant me.  :)

Ahh thanks guys for all the love!! <3 <3  I'm currently working on my 11th champion cosplay- Victorious Janna for Worlds!! (i'll post my favorite photos of each later)

Here's some of my favorites that I don't think have been mentioned yet.

Pizoobie's Koi Nami:
https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/q71/s720x720/1170782_627463810620487_62000461_n.jpg 
Photo by Martin Wong

Orobas Cosplay's , Headhunter Nid:
https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash4/q71/s720x720/1235196_626241854076016_843435836_n.jpg

Deumovochka Cosplay's Mystic Cass:
https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash4/q71/s720x720/1236926_626251770741691_1014382867_n.jpg

TidusSurya's Thresh:
https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn1/q71/s720x720/11184_620913711275497_1956515255_n.jpg

Valentis Cosplay FREAKING TURRET COSPLAY!! 
https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-frc3/q77/s720x720/1150182_618545501512318_1220710997_n.jpg

Everything M.A.R.C.H - Philippines group puts out:
https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-frc3/q71/s720x720/1170808_616750808358454_1015961560_n.jpg

Issabel Cosplay & other's Elise and Zyra cosplay!!
https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn1/q71/s720x720/935489_577664872267048_422811666_n.jpg

and

https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn1/1234667_579628612100041_715241166_n.jpg
Thank you for the mention! <3

My favs are Missyeru, Jynx and Pizoobie!
I made a Lulu cosplay a while ago: 
http://i.imgur.com/fQOLCCi.png 
And this is my page: https://www.facebook.com/ArturiaCosplay
I'm working on Bilgewater Katarina and Lux atm, and will probably make a few more LoL costumes soon.

Hi!

I cosplayed Rengar at PAX, and had such a great time! 

I've found a few pictures kicking around, but here's one that an adorable little girl wanted to have with the "fluffy kitty" :D 
http://imgur.com/NzUY5ou

Also, in the spirit of large cats and small children, http://imgur.com/je6IMU1

I don't actually have a fancy cosplay page since I'm still fairly new to this stuff, but I love talking to peeps so feel free to bother me at https://www.facebook.com/Flufffy

Yay for more cosplayers!

I've been trying to find your facebook page/information for ages. I tried to get a picture with you at PAX but you were on your way to a photo shoot. Anyway, YAY I've found you! Awesome work, keep it up!

There are too many amazing League cosplayers on my Facebook feed to include them all, but here are some I didn't see mentioned in the comments yet!

**Jynx's Vayne, Neon Strike Vi and Pentakill Sona**! --> https://www.facebook.com/JynxedArt

https://fbcdn-sphotos-a-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/p206x206/942090_371161146326129_355441360_n.png

https://fbcdn-sphotos-b-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/530544_420568134718763_1220704801_n.jpg

https://scontent-b-lga.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/556300_404373469671563_232814228_n.jpg

**Swansel Cosplay's Syndra**! --> https://www.facebook.com/SwanselArt

https://fbcdn-sphotos-b-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/1003881_418826884902741_752157043_n.jpg

**Deumovochka Cosplay's Exalted Cassiopeia** --> https://www.facebook.com/pages/Deumovochka-Cosplay/

https://fbcdn-sphotos-d-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/536825_333884960080566_1598150148_n.jpg

Obligatory shameless self promotion - **Orobas Cosplay's Headhunter Nidalee** --> https://www.facebook.com/OrobasCosplay

https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/1237003_444400155678100_716116751_n.jpg

Hello, I just saw this thread! All the cosplays here are pretty much amazing <3. I personally like Missyeru's VI and SpicySeasoning's High Comand Katarina! But most of them are pretty cool!

Here are mine: 
Katarina: https://scontent-b.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/q71/s720x720/1075838_573694065999958_870664636_n.jpg

and VI (with my friend as Caitlyn :3): https://scontent-a.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/1176163_603728116345812_196589516_n.jpg

my page: https://www.facebook.com/IeatkeybladesCosplay

I'm currently deciding my next league cosplay!
I also want to thank Riot for being such an awesome player focused comunity! You guys rock <3

These are all amazing guys. I'm always blown away to see the amount of effort and creativity that goes into recreating the champions. Keep up the good work and hope to see you bringing your art to worlds!

I love her Teemo! [https://www.facebook.com/OfficialJessicaNigri]

[https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10151783543002533&set=a.474726512532.283356.349054752532&type=3&theater]

[https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.10151783268702533.1073741841.349054752532&type=3]

Here are some of my Quinn Cosplay photos! ^.^
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=160474090822404&set=pb.145196819016798.-2207520000.1379602052.&type=3&theater
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=160474064155740&set=pb.145196819016798.-2207520000.1379602052.&type=3&theater
This is my only League Cosplay so far, but I am currently working on Ice Drake Shyvana! If you want to see progress photos of her you can check out my facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Puppichu
Check out this Pinterest page for ridiculous LOL stuff:  http://www.pinterest.com/thomasvu/
Wow this is all so crazy. I would love to do a cosplay, but I don't know who I could do as I'm not great at sewing or prop making.

Hey guys, This was my Graves Cosplay that I went as for Anime Expo 2013. Hope you guys like it!
http://frekki.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/dscn8058.jpg

For my First cosplay i did Riot Graves at PAX PRIME 2013. I most definitely will be doing more, and hopefully some really cool twists on some league champs

(https://www.facebook.com/CautleyCosplay)

Partial to Yaya Han's Fiona here.

https://www.facebook.com/yayacosplay
